title: How to Zoom With a Web Browser

steps.title: Get a browser that supports zooming such as Firefox or Opera.
steps.content: Get a browser that supports zooming such as Firefox or Opera .

steps.title: Click to View then Zoom then Zoom Text Only if you wish.
steps.content: Click to View then Zoom then Zoom Text Only if you wish.

steps.title: Press Ctrl and + to zoom in.
steps.content: Press Ctrl and + to zoom in.

steps.title: Press Ctrl and - to zoom out.
steps.content: Press Ctrl and - to zoom out.

steps.title: Press Ctrl and 0 to restore the original size.
steps.content: Press Ctrl and 0 to restore the original size.

steps.title: Use the "Command" key (⌘ Cmd) instead of "Ctrl".
steps.content: Use the "Command" key ( ⌘ Cmd ) instead of "Ctrl". Alt is Command on some keyboards.

steps.title: Press ⌘ Cmd++ to zoom in.
steps.content: Press ⌘ Cmd + + to zoom in. If the buttons don't work, in chrome, go to the menu drop-down and by Zoom press "-" or "+" to zoom out or in, respectively.
